channel.title: seninp.github.io on Pavel Senin
channel.description: Recent content in seninp.github.io on Pavel Senin

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I have graduated from the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory, UH Manoa ICS, where Professor Philip M Johnson advised me. The focus of my dissertation research was on empirical software process discovery. Working on this, I have proposed, designed, and developed the Software Trajectory Analysis (STA) framework – a general approach for recurrent behavior discovery from systematic measurements of software process and product artifacts (i.e., “software telemetry”). Given a contrast set of measurements (collected from two or more processes), STA leverages the SAX-VSM algorithm and outputs a set of software process-characteristic behaviors for each of the input classes.
